Public NotInheritable Class EventSetterHandlerConverter Inherits TypeConverter
public ref class EventSetterHandlerConverter sealed : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Converts the string name of an event setter handler to a delegate representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about how XAML for WPF processes event handler names, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
